description: All agents have the same number of activities (14), which is unusual and may indicate a lack of diversity in task distribution or a reporting error.
recommendation: Review the task allocation mechanism to ensure tasks are being distributed according to each agent's role and capabilities. Verify the reporting system for any errors.

description: The API latency and throughput values are unusually high compared to CPU and memory usage, which are moderate. This could indicate a bottleneck or inefficiency in the system.
recommendation: Investigate the API handling processes and network infrastructure to identify potential bottlenecks. Consider optimizing the code or scaling resources to improve performance.

description: Compliance status is marked as true for both performance and reliability, but given the performance anomalies, this may need further verification.
recommendation: Conduct a detailed compliance audit to ensure that the performance metrics align with compliance standards. Verify the criteria used to determine compliance status.
